meanings.sent1: The government legislates rules to keep people safe.
meanings.sent2: The parliament legislates on important issues affecting the country.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to legislate that all dogs must wear hats.
meanings.sent4: Her pen legislates order onto the chaotic paper.
meanings.sent5: The teacher legislates silence in the classroom with a stern look.

meanings.sent1: The committee legislates new rules for the community.
meanings.sent2: The congress legislates on bills to improve healthcare.
meanings.sent3: The aliens legislated a law that all humans must eat ice cream daily.
meanings.sent4: His signature legislates the bill into law, changing lives.
meanings.sent5: The judge legislates justice with a fair and unbiased approach.
